value.name: Prince Harry plays up NFL connection in his and Meghan Markle's new Sussex.com site
value.description: Harry and Meghan's new website has quite a number of changes. For instance, the site used to be titled SussexRoyal.com. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex likely dropped "royal" from their URL after agreeing to no longer use the word. The agreement came after they resigned from their position in the Royal Family in 2020.

value.name: Meghan Markle's romantic Valentine's Day plans with Prince Harry in Canada
value.description: Meghan Markle once revealed her dream Valentine's Day would be spent in Paris, but this year she will be celebrating the romantic day in Canada with Prince Harry

value.name: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry Quietly Launch New Sussex.com Website
value.description: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry just got an online makeover. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex quietly launched a new website, Sussex.com, on Monday. The web address encompasses the latest news about the couple, bios for Prince Harry, 39, and Meghan, 42, as well as links to their Archewell Foundation organization and Archewell Productions hub.

value.name: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle rebuilding Sussex brand as they launch new website
value.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have launched a new website ahead of their trip to Canada this week. Sussex.com went 'live' on Monday and is operated by the Office of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, as a "one-stop shop" for all of their activities.

value.name: Patrick J. Adams and Gabriel Macht respond to Meghan Markle question following show's potential return
value.description: Suits stars Patrick J. Adams and Gabriel Macht have responded to a question about Meghan Markle following the news of a reboot. Although the original series by Aaron Korsh ended in 2019, the show was the most-streamed series of last year, racking up more than three billion views over seven consecutive weeks.

value.name: Meghan Markle is all smiles as she showcases her storytelling skills during special outing
